detail_desc: Knee-length skirt in patterned satin with a regular waist, a pleat at the front, a concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with print stripes on the sleeves, a yoke, dropped shoulders and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with print stripes on the sleeves, a yoke, dropped shoulders and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with print stripes on the sleeves, a yoke, dropped shoulders and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Satin nightshirt with print stripes, notch lapels, buttons down the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Chest pocket and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in woven fabric. V-neck top in a double layer with narrow, double shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Short pyjama shorts in a cotton weave with narrow elastication at the waist and short slits in the hems.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves in a tapered fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Oversized denim jacket with beading, a collar, and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket, low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs with beaded decoration at the hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with crossover straps at the front, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Faux fur headband with a knot detail at the front.
